scene.name: Desk with three cups
scene.description: A desk surface with three disposable cups placed side-by-side in a row.

task.name: Stack and unstack cups
task.description: Stack the three disposable cups together and then separate them back into three individual cups.
task.spoken_prompt: Task started: we will stack the three cups and then separate them again.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务开始：我们将把三个杯子叠在一起，然后再将它们分开。

subtasks.description: First stage: transitioning from three separate cups to a single stacked set.
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Phase 1: Preparing to stack the three cups.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一阶段：准备将三个杯子叠放在一起。

steps.description: Pick up the middle cup as the first cup to stack.
steps.spoken_prompt: Now, use your right hand to pick up the middle cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 现在，请用右手拿起中间的杯子。

steps.description: Pick up the left cup to prepare it for stacking under the middle cup.
steps.spoken_prompt: Next, use your left hand to pick up the left cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 接着，请用左手拿起左边的杯子。

steps.description: Insert the left cup into the middle cup.
steps.spoken_prompt: Now, use your left hand to insert the left cup into the middle cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 现在，请用左手将左边的杯子插入中间的杯子里。

steps.description: Pick up the right cup to prepare it for stacking under the combined set.
steps.spoken_prompt: Next, use your right hand to pick up the right cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 接着，请用右手拿起右边的杯子。

steps.description: Insert the combined cup set into the right cup to finish stacking.
steps.spoken_prompt: Now, use both hands to insert the two-cup stack into the right cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 现在，请用双手将两个叠好的杯子插入右边的杯子里。

subtasks.description: Second stage: transitioning from the stacked set back to three individual cups.
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Phase 2: Preparing to separate the stacked cups.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二阶段：准备将叠好的杯子重新分开。

steps.description: Lift the stacked set by holding the outermost right cup.
steps.spoken_prompt: Now, use your right hand to lift the stacked cups by holding the outermost cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 现在，请用右手抓住最外层的杯子将整个叠杯提起。

steps.description: Separate the right cup from the remaining two cups.
steps.spoken_prompt: Next, use your right hand to pull the right cup away from the stack.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 接着，请用右手将右边的杯子从叠杯中分离出来。

steps.description: Hold the remaining two-cup stack and remove the middle cup from the left cup.
steps.spoken_prompt: Now, use your left hand to separate the middle cup from the left cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 现在，请用左手将中间的杯子从左边的杯子中分离出来。

constraints.notes: All actions must involve only the three cups present on the desk. Steps use atomic movements with specified hand usage.
